mapper.update: update tb_address set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, town_id = #{townId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, province_id, city_id, town_id, mobile, address, contact, is_default, notes, create_date, alias from tb_address where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
